item.title: Keep 3 items upon death?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

How would I make it so you keep 3 items when you die?

It currently only keeps 1, and that came with the source.

Would be nice for 3 most valuable items but it does not matter.

Tell me if you need more…

addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount); if(keepItem2 != 0) addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2); if(keepItem3 != 0) addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

All I know is the ! means not

Edited, question: would removeing the ! fix it or something? Or does this code have anything special to it?

Yes, I KNOW, I am a dumbass so just tell me.
